title: Going Out for a Walk - presents conversation to

content.prompt: In the third paragraph, the author presents the conversation between the brain and the soul in order to

choices.label: propose an important link between physical fitness and mental fitness
account for the brain’s behavior described earlier in the passage
introduce a difference between the two that will be refuted later
explain why the body must obey the soul’s impulses

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
